name: meiotic

relating to the act or process of meiosis (= a type of cell division): meiotic division The completion of meiotic maturation is important for fertilization and subsequent embryo development. See
meiosis
More examplesFewer examplesThe factors regulating meiotic progression are not species-specific.Too few sperm were being produced because of meiotic arrest.The ability to complete meiotic division could be impaired.
